oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Alsatian girls

oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; Women; Clothing & dress
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Three Alsatian women in native dress standing near a canopy of trees. The woman on the left has her hand on a wooden chair. The women are wearing boldly patterned dresses and have oversized bows in their hair.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Karl Kleeman World War I Photographs
